title: HELP! Patch 5.23 stuck at 1 file scanned
body:
Hey guys

So i'm having issues patching right now and i'm at my wits end with it.
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} 
I open the patcher and I get a bug splat message but the client hasn't closed.
**EDIT: I get the bug splat when I close the client...**
The client then says "calculating differences / 1 file scanned" and 33%. It will sit like this for hours and not even flicker. Iv'e been searching for solutions but the only ones I can find at at least 6 months+ old. And I have no idea if they are still relevant and iv'e tried a few and so far nothing :(
**EDIT: Just launched it using the launcher file in the files and i'm at a miracle _2 files scanned_**

Any help will be appreciated!

replies.body: redownloaded, eventually worked, but not al all happy with the 5.4GB of data ive expended in the process, not happ[y at all Riot

Hey WhoNeedsReasons,

Can you try the solutions in [**this thread**](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/qGY56UB4-comprehensive-troubleshooting-your-patching-issues) and let me know if anything works for you?
Well update, I disabled the firewall and its now downloading but its still extremely slow, only at 22KBps :(
